labels.disable_widget: Disable native widget and use Afrux supported widget instead

settings.button_order_text: Edit this setting to adjust this widget's position on the sideNav section of your Flarum forum. The higher the number, the higher this widget will be on the sideNav items list (this value can be either positive or negative).
settings.separator_order_text: Edit this setting to adjust the separator's position for this widget on the sideNav section of your Flarum forum. The higher the number, the higher the separator will be on the sideNav items list (this value can be either positive or negative).
